trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object must be created for each row in the control.
trans-unit.target: Antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle pode ser processado, uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto deve ser criado para cada linha no controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated> event is raised each time a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>é gerado sempre que uma linha no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle é criado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowCreated>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding custom content to a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada, como adicionar conteúdo personalizado a uma linha, sempre que esse evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, each row in the control must be bound to a record in the data source before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control can be rendered.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, cada linha no controle deve ser vinculada a um registro na fonte de dados antes do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle pode ser processado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound> event is raised when a data row (represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object) is bound to data in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>evento é gerado quando uma linha de dados (representado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto) está associada aos dados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDataBound>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as modifying the values of the data bound to the row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que você forneça um método de manipulação de eventos que executa uma rotina personalizada, como modificar os valores de dados associados à linha, sempre que esse evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: A GridViewRowEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to access the properties of the row that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto GridViewRowEventArgs é passado para o método de manipulação de eventos, que permite acessar as propriedades da linha que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar uma célula específica na linha, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto contido no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode determinar que tipo de linha (linha de cabeçalho, linha de dados e assim por diante) que está sendo criado usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewRowEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de GridViewRowEventArgs, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra o valor da propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the `row` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>| O objeto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>contido no `row` parâmetro. | > [!NOTE] > Este construtor é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle quando gerar eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRowEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto que representa a linha que está sendo criada ou associada a dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a linha que está sendo criada ou associada a dados.

trans-unit.source: Use the Row property to access the properties of the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de linha para acessar as propriedades da linha que está sendo criada ou associada a dados.

trans-unit.source: To access a specific cell in the row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object contained in the Row property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar uma célula específica na linha, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto contido na propriedade de linha.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also determine which row type (header row, data row, and so on) is being created by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode determinar que tipo de linha (linha de cabeçalho, linha de dados e assim por diante) que está sendo criado usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow.RowType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"></xref> object that represents the row being created or data-bound.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewRow"> </xref> objeto que representa a linha que está sendo criada ou associada a dados.
